website_summaries.verdict: You get more than just Baby Shark with this song book. Perfect for babies, with bright colors and fun music.
pros: 10 abbreviated songs from Baby Shark to classics like Twinkle, Twinkle
Buttons are easy for babies and toddlers to push
cons: A small percentage of the sound boxes don't work even after replacing the batteries

customer_reviews.title: Great book for the baby shark toy line!
customer_reviews.text: great book and glad we made this purchase. Our daughter loves this book and with the rounded edges and water proof pages it’s a great quality book.
customer_reviews.author: Sun

customer_reviews.title: This book is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I thought this book was a little pricey at first when I bought it, but it's amazing. It's a good size, the artwork on the pages is high quality and colorful, and it plays each song in it's entirety. It comes with batteries already and you need AAA batteries when those run out. The pages are chunky like a board book. If your baby likes baby shark, they will LOVE this book.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Baby Shark with a toddler
customer_reviews.text: I love this because it gets my toddler's full baby shark fix in, without having to stick an iPhone in front of her face. She loves this book and playing the songs and never asks for baby shark on a screen/device anymore. Also it's nice for parents because you can easily turn a song off whenever you want; you don't have to let the song play out all the way to wait for it to finish like some other annoying toys. There are I think 8 different types of songs (one of them is the regular baby shark song) that she likes to rotate through and keep her busy with a BOOK not an iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: MBo

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU for the on / off switch!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely LOVES anything Baby Shark and this is his favorite book! It plays the songs in their entirety so hence my headline - very thankful for the on /off switch! It's a great book for your little one if they're into baby shark!
customer_reviews.author: angela diggle

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler lovessss this book. She's been taking it for car rides, inside stores, and likes to have it in bed with her. She's almost two and can easily press the buttons herself, which is a huge plus for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: This book is amazing!!!!! Plays the full baby shark songs and other songs! My 2 year olds haven’t stopped carrying it around!
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Over priced! Not worth what they are charging.
customer_reviews.text: Over priced! This book is not worth $20. I would return it for my money back but they are deducting $6 from my total for shipping it back to them. I do not recommend buying this book, it is cute, but in no way is it worth the price they are asking! Very upset with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: catlover

customer_reviews.title: Did not work when we got it!! :(
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this book to put in my 15 month old babies Easter basket. Once I received it, I unwrapped it and turned it in to try it out. It started to play the song and then stopped and would no longer work. None of the buttons would play music so I replaced with new batteries and tried again. It did not work. I now have to return it and figure out another idea for her Easter basket. I was just super excited for her to get this just to have to go through the hassle of returning it and not having it for the holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandr Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Buy from another seller for this item.
customer_reviews.text: Defective craftsmanship. No sound. Replaced the batteries turned it on & still no sound. Very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in April for my 18 mo granddaughter to play with at my house. Today, after probably being played with 10 times stopped working. No singing anymore. Changed the batteries two different times and still doesn't work. If she lived with me and played it every day then I could have gotten a new one but since it is past the 30 day window, no. Please replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A Arant

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter is 13 months and loves the pictures and songs!
customer_reviews.text: She doesn’t talk yet, but she knows her Baby Shark!! She had just received the book in this video and she played with it for almost two hours before falling asleep!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Niece loved it
customer_reviews.text: Niece loved it and plays with it all the time. When she first played it she looked at the TV thinking it was on TV and realized it was the book instead. Brother and sister in law have a love hate relationship since my niece got the book. :)
customer_reviews.author: T_Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound!! Sturdy!! Worth it so far.  Update!!! THIS IS TRASH
customer_reviews.text: BABY LOVES IT!!!! sound is incredible!!! Just like the videos! Quality is one of the best. Would buy it again!!! UPDATE!!!!!!!! TOTAL AGGRAVATION WITH THIS BOOK!! STOPPED WORKING SOO FAST!!!! I WOULD NEVER BUY THIS AGAIN I WANT A REFUND!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Dingess

customer_reviews.title: Great book, plays full songs, just really LOUD.
customer_reviews.text: My 17 month old really enjoys this book. It has nice thick pages and the buttons are easy to press. The pages associate the button to push to play the song which she’s too young for but I’m sure will she will get soon enough. It plays the full baby shark song. The others are short songs as well. I took away a star because it is so LOUD. When I sit with her and read it I have to cover the speaker with my hand because it’s too loud for me. I can’t imagine how it is for her little ears. I wish there was a volume button not just an on off.
customer_reviews.author: Katey

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it! Get it!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this book! What surprised me, the book shows hand movement for each song. My niece instantly recognized the book and all the songs worked and played well. It was a perfect gift! Well worth the 20.00 dollars I spent for this! If your child likes this kind of thing get it...you will get your money’s worth of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Woods

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves this. This book is the best thing I have ever bought for her. She takes it every where and jams out to all of the songs on it. It's the only book she hasn't destroyed because she loves it so much. She has destroyed all the other hard page books she has owned accept this one. The only thing I don't like, and the only reason for 4 stars is because of the Christmas song. Not everyone celebrates holidays. And not everyone wants their children to be exposed to that. There should be a baby shark book without that option. Other than that, the book is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L Hilgren

customer_reviews.title: No longer working after a month
customer_reviews.text: We bought this January 21st and my 1 year old played with it here and there. It was her favorite for a week. Now the songs dont finish before it short circuits and stops playing. some of the songs dont work at all at first push. We are so disappointed that we missed the return window for a replacement. no durability and this is an expensive book! My daughter is so bummed.
customer_reviews.author: MKBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love
customer_reviews.text: My toddler absolutely loved this book. Unfortunately it is now in 2 pieces. Any kid would love this but it’s not toddler proof. I haven’t found any book to be toddler proof though. I would definitely still recommend if you don’t mind it being played all day. Luckily there is an off switch but, once again, not toddler proof and is easily found and switched back on my little hands. Planning on getting one for my niece as well. It does play the whole baby shark song and other baby shark versions of nursery rhymes.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Edwards

customer_reviews.title: For all baby shark lovers, parents worst night mare
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece cause she loves baby shark. She started bopping and clapping her hands to the baby shark song as soon as she pressed it. The book is quite expensive but seeing how much she loved it and how happy she was made it all worth it. If only it came with different volume settings. The book itself is sturdy with a good amount of pages. There are a lot of shark songs along with the lyrics that goes with it. My niece loves it and my sister hates it🤣 bottom line I’m glad I got this over then stuffed shark that sings- best Aunty of the year award goes to me🙋🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: My daughters favorite book ever
customer_reviews.text: My daughters favorite book ever. She loves to push all of the songs when we ride in the car. The only thing is that there is not a volume adjustment (low & high as seen on other toys). It's not like it's LOUD or anything, just wish I had that option for my sanity.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Old batteries leaked
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really know how good this book actually is because it didn’t work when we received it. My poor little niece wanted to play with it so badly but the batteries were old and leaked inside the holder. I’ll get back to you on how well the book is once I replace the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: S. Monaco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your mini baby shark enthusiast!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the package my 14 month old stopped what she was doing and ran over to grab this book in excitement... it was so cute! I usually have to introduce new toys by playing with her,... I do read to her everyday so she does love books, but the fascination with baby shark is simply on another level! What I love about this is that she’s able to independently “read”,.. I usually take great care of the books in her library and only give her full access to indestructibles, but I feel that this board book is made well and so fair so good! She loves sitting down pressing the music and flipping through her book!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Highly Entertaining for Young Children!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how this book consistently engages little children. I had also purchased the Baby Shark plush toy that moves around the floor while the Baby Shark songs are played. Little children under age 3 did not find the toy as entertaining as they found the book.In fact, two of them a one year old and a three year old were more fearful of the toy. But with the book they did not exhibit the same discomfort. They were fascinated with pressing the buttons, turning the pages and even bouncing to the beat when the music plays. Great book!
customer_reviews.author: mamakac

customer_reviews.title: On/off switch!
customer_reviews.text: This book is gold. My kid is obsessed with baby shark and now he can play it whenever he wants. But it has a switch. A magical on/off switch for when I can’t stand it any longer. It also plays a variety of songs so I don’t get tired of the same one. We love this book in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Lcarbajal

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5* but...
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old son absolutely LOVES Baby Shark and this book was in instant hit. He adores it. However after just one week, it has stopped working. I have tried changing batteries but nothing seems to be bringing it back to life. The sadness in his eyes when he presses the buttons and gets no music back is unbearable :-(
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Holding

customer_reviews.title: Gives my toddlers their baby shark fix
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3 year old twins fight over it. They think it’s that great. I didn’t buy them each one because listening to two books at the same time might give me a seizure. We’ve had it for a week and it’s still considered great entertainment for like 20-30 min increments multiple times a day which is almost unheard of for a child’s toy. Glad not to have them staring at a screen but a book instead. With that said, it’s super loud and annoying. But so is the video on the iPad so...I give 5 stars. It is not the books fault the songs are super annoying. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. But too loud.
customer_reviews.text: It's too loud. I do not hear well, and this hurts MY ears. We will have to put some packing tape over the speaker. I'm glad I only paid $13 for this. I don't find it worth $20 or 25 by any means... But maybe that is because I am only familiar with the Baby Shark song on it? It will drive my middle child crazy when my toddler plays it though. And that is what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves it but overpriced- 3.5 star
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 3.5 star. The product is fine and my baby really loves pressing it, but it is overpriced compared to its functions. I have a Vtech Musical Book and a leapfrog 100 words book, both have more functions and are better designed than this book but cheaper than this book. This book is colorful but it's hard for my baby to press the songs at the beginning. Don't know why it's so expensive. UPDATE: My baby really loves playing with it. I will give it a 4 star instead. Still think overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Fye

customer_reviews.title: Pretty expensive for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Like my title says, this item is expensive for what you get ($20). My daughter is in love with the baby shark song so being the sucker that I am, got her this book. The pages are difficult for her to flip versus other books that have tabs or at least space between the the pages and the side for her to stick her fingers in and flip them. These require much more fine motor skills which my 11 month lacks for the moment. I think there a better quality books out there but of course because it's baby shark the quality and thought into the product is less and the price higher, hence my 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: T. Le

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with this book. We bought it for him when he was 18 months and at 25 months he still loves it. I couldn’t believe I was spending $20 on a baby shark book but after it being used for 7 months and still going strong it is worth every penny. We only use it in the car since it keeps him so entertained during long car rides. Don’t get me wrong all these little ditties will be stuck in your head forever and a day but if it means a happy baby/toddler I’ll take it.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: If you love your child and hate yourself it's a great gift.
customer_reviews.text: My child like most young children these days love baby shark. She asks for it on Youtube, has a baby shark shirt, a baby shark cube that sings the song, and now this book. Mercifully this book has more than just the main song. Like most of these sound books there are several options that they have included. The songs have been changed to have a sea life theme. Wheels.on the bus si going about whales and crabs for example. So far it has held up to a destructive 2 year old so it lasted longer than the last book like this we got. I recommend this for your kid and a pair of ear plugs for you.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISINGLY amazing
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly great quality. Smooth and thick colorful pages. They really did not spare on production. One gripe is you can't control volume or stop the song mid-play, but it's a small price to pay for how long it keeps my 2.5 year old's attention. For Xmas we drove 13 hours to PA and it would keep him busy for around 2 hours at a time (this is extremely shocking, as my 2.5 year old is a rambunctious, active boy who loses interest easily). It has many songs and now he's learning all the words. Get it!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Bodek

customer_reviews.title: Dino songs!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these songs so I thought this would be a hit and it was! It was packaged nicely but once I opened the book there was really strange, deep scratches on the page. I was really disappointed since this book is pretty pricey but otherwise- would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: StephB

customer_reviews.title: Great book for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as one of my kids Christmas gift and was awesome. Batteries included loud but no volume control only an on and off button,I do wish there was volume control but not a big deal. The first page is the baby shark song the rest are pink fongs remake of classics like the wheels on the bus and twinkle little star with shark twists of course. The last one is A Santa / baby shark happy holidays song. My 15 month old loves it we read it together and he often looks through it on his own.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t celebrate Christmas and REALLY wish the book didn’t include a Christmas song. Plus Christmas is only one a year, why include it in a toy the child will play with all year round. Besides the Christmas song, it’s a very good book. My son loves the baby shark song, ABC song and numbers song on it, I just had to break the Christmas button and glue the last page down due to the Christmas aspect. It’s a pagan holiday that we take no part in and I didn’t notice there was a Christmas song in it until it was too late and I gave it to my son for his birthday 🎁
customer_reviews.author: LACPuma316

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Songs Sound Book
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this from the moment she opened it at Christmas. Seems to be well made, easy for an 18 month old to “operate” and plays the songs so they are easily understandable.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Darling

customer_reviews.title: If you love Baby Shark!
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter loves this book. Strong cardboard pages so easy for toddlers to turn the pages and no ripping. Relevant, age appropriate songs with easy to press buttons. Vibrant colors in eye catching pictures so if you can listen to baby shark songs over and over, this is a great find!
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Great songs, volume and button issues
customer_reviews.text: 19mo old daughter LOVES this book.. GREAT song selections in the book, great sound. I only Wish there was a quieter option for the songs (initially, she was afraid of the volume of the songs) and I wish The buttons were a little easier to activate when pushed (hard for a 19 mo old to push and get the song herself- mom or dad usually ends up doing it for her). But because of the quality of the book and the lovely song suggestions, I still Will give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ficus Fancy

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for those baby shark fans
customer_reviews.text: Immediately I could see the joy in my little one's face when he saw the iconic pink fox and fishes. The buttons are perfect for him to push and follow the songs. He has dropped it numerous times, yet it is still in tact and plays perfectly fine. There isn't any volume control, but it is loud enough to hear quite well.
customer_reviews.author: N.

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, but confusing
customer_reviews.text: This Baby Shark sing-a-long book works well and keeps my grandson interested, but the lyrics are different from the lyrics in the original songs. This makes it confusing when singing along. Other than that, it seems well made and sturdy. In my opinion, if they were going to have "baby shark themed" songs, they should not have used tried and true children's songs.
customer_reviews.author: Lilli Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 1.5 year old niece. She loved it. The buttons are easy for her to press when she wants to change the song. The pages are thick enough that she wont be able to fold them. There is no volume control on sound but it's a perfection of loudness, it even caught my 4 month old nieces attention. It does have an on/off switch on the back where the battery compartment is. The battery door is closed tightly and it may take a lot of effort from an adult to open it.
customer_reviews.author: Allylisa

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun book!
customer_reviews.text: My son and daughter love all Pinkfong songs and this book was perfect for them. They're singing and reading along with the music. The sound quality is great and actually plays the entire song. The photos in the book are really fun and makes it exciting for the kids to read. I appreciate that there's an on/off button on the back.
customer_reviews.author: JCheng

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this sing along book just a big kid who loves her baby shark!:) No seriously I had a baby a little over a month ago and while I was pregnant I played baby shark for my little one in hopes he'd come out and it would grow on him too. So I ordered this book to read and sing to my little man! It was a bit pricey but it's absolutely adorable and well worth it to me. I'd recommend to anyone who's also head over heels for baby shark doo doo doo doo!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t work. I replaced the batteries and it still didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sanders

customer_reviews.title: This book will make you and your baby happy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book for my grandson. I cannot tell you enough how much he loves it. He lives in Japan, so when we Facetime, I play it for him and hold up the book so he can see the pictures. Recently, I went to visit and took it to him. His face lit up. and the smile!!!! He takes it in the car, and everywhere else. When he fusses, this is the ONE thing that makes him stop! The batteries last a very long time as well. Sturdy board book style pages. I hope the company makes another one with other songs!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Baby Shark Lovers and Limiting Screen Time
customer_reviews.text: Really hesitant because of the price but my daughter is obsessed with the pink fong music videos and I really want to limit screen time so I got her this for her birthday and oh my was it so worth it! She wouldn't put it down for weeks! It's so amazing how one button sings whole songs (while the plush from pink tong only sings parts of it which really angers her). Totally worth the price and is a great gift for a toddler! It's been 6 weeks and shes still not bored with it and it's super durable board book pages! Still looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Keely

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 22 months old and got in love with baby sharks watching them on TV-he imitates all the moves and recognizes the whole "shark family"! That's why I decided to get him this book hoping he will like it too and he does! The only complain my daughter has is why is there not a volume adjustment! When my grandson gets up early in the morning and turns the songs on right away, then you can imagine how it is :)
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound book
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this for my kid. It includes a few of the most popular kids songs. One song each page with corresponding button for the music. My kid loves it. The one problem I have is that the buttons are difficult to use. You have to push hard to get it working. I guess it might be designed that way so kids need to push properly? Felt it is not easy even for parents.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: It’s hard to touch and play the music
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very lovely book. My baby loves the music and graphics. However, it’s so hard for my baby to touch and play the music. You have to try several times to get the music. Baby always be mad at it...
customer_reviews.author: Ivy C

customer_reviews.title: My (almost) 2 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: I hated the baby shark songs before my youngest was born. She has taken it to from the minute she heard it though so we've gotten a few baby shark items (she loves the pool toys too.) This book was a HUGE hit. It has a handful of different songs for them to play and my girl pushes the button and dances to each one. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Whyyyyyy?
customer_reviews.text: Just don’t! Lol. It’s loud, your kids will love it and you will despise it quickly. Great to gift a friend or family member who you owe a little gift giving payback to! But honestly, my son loved it, but it quickly went missing. It’s loud.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Kids are obsessed
customer_reviews.text: My 2 and 5 yr old are obsessed with the shark song. The one song that they are famous for...so I decided to get the book and both my kids love it. The songs are cute and they love the tunes. The book itself is sturdy, but it's played heavily by my 2 yr old, so it's holding up decently well although it now has pencil marks and impressions on it from being hit. The music still plays strongly and there are are variety of songs in the book that keep it interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Amie A.

customer_reviews.title: Buttons hard to push, didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I was so upset Xmas morning when my great granddaughter opened this book up, excited to hear her absolute favorite Baby Shark Songs. Not only the buttons were really hard for her to push Dow, many would not work at all. It’s already opened and she’s playing with it, so I won’t return it but really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE V.

customer_reviews.title: Best Kids Book I own
customer_reviews.text: The songs play a long amount of time which the kids love and there are many different versions of the songs. There are a lot of buttons to push which they love. Great colorful book. This one is garbed first when the kids come over.
customer_reviews.author: barcode

customer_reviews.title: Super catchy but loud
customer_reviews.text: This baby shark book is a favorite among our household (ages 1-6). The pages are super durable and the sounds quality is so clear and LOUD. There isn't any volume control so be prepared to limit your toddlers use of this book... The songs are full lengths rather than clips so definitely worth the price! I would say it would make a good gift despite the lack of volume control
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Baby crack.
customer_reviews.text: Well. Where do I start? After my 2 y.o. sister fell in love with the infamous song baby shark and would constantly ask me to play it, I decided I'd get her something for her to play it herself. Well it came and the whole house knows all 10 songs word for word now. Just buy it, 3 months later she still listens to every day. Its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves baby shark. We needed something we could take with use that has that song on it. So this book is awesome for on the go and in car rides. It plays the full song!!! It is a little loud but I just putting packing tape over the speaker. I love that it was an off and on switch in the back this way it’s not going off in the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Mjs

customer_reviews.title: If you are ready to give your toddler control over playing Baby Shark...
customer_reviews.text: I've come to terms with Baby Shark. It's happening and rankly, it could be worse. What I WAS a little tired of was having to stop what I'm doing all the time to play the song. I bought this for my 22 month old and now she can just do it herself. Much easier. Plus there are some other songs so we get some variety every now and then. She loves it and that's really all that matters. I DO wish there was at least one other volume setting. And definitely wouldn't recommend getting as a gift without a parent's permission.
customer_reviews.author: JRB

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. My grandbaby loves baby shark but after the first time use there was no sound though it was faint even the first time. Then the buttons underneath were it shows to push were not in that spot. Had to fill around for them and they were too hard to push.
customer_reviews.author: Labrenda

customer_reviews.title: I hate that I love this
customer_reviews.text: Well, my 18 month old absolutely loves this thing. In the car, it keeps him quiet and occupied for hours. Its sturdy, well made, and thankfully has an off button. (Sort of wish there was a volume level.) It also comes with several different Baby Shark tunes. My only complaint is that now my son is able to play "Baby Shark" over and over again as much as he wants.
customer_reviews.author: Ayla Mendez

customer_reviews.title: A big hit! Gave it to my nephew and now my house needs one too.
customer_reviews.text: When I read about this book having FULL songs I knew I had to get it for my nephew’s second birthday. He likes sharks and I wanted to annoy my sis & bil. Mwahaha. A Chase ( from Paw Patrol ) was his favorite gift but he put it down to dance! “Baby Shark” is now his go to song to keep him calm if he starts having a meltdown. Love it!!! It has quality sound and pictures. The songs all have a shark spin. My son ( 4 yrs ) opened the package before I got home and this was his favorite book out of the bunch. So I’ll have to order another one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: My Son is Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: This book has be quite the entertainment piece for my 16 month old son! He walks around with it in his hands, smiling and dancing. It has saved us from many meltdowns both in the car and in the food store. I have now bought this book 5 times as a gift for my friends' kids and my nephew and they all say the same thing! Would buy it again and again just to see the joy and smile on my son's face!
customer_reviews.author: Peter McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Adorable book
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this book for my 2 1/2 year old niece who LOVES baby shark. Was shipped fast! It was also packaged perfectly. I can't listen to the audio, as it is sealed in plastic wrap. The book also has an on/off button, which I'm sure will help the battery shelf life. So even though I can't vouch for the music, the book itself looks very cute and sturdy. Can't wait to give this to her!
customer_reviews.author: Coffeegirl

customer_reviews.title: The musical book is defective and does not work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my newest grandson and he loved it. About 4 months ago it started playing irregularly. I changed the batteries twice and it will work for a few days then stops working again. Now my grandson cries all the time because when he pushes the buttons he can't get one of his favorite toys to work. The company should stand behind their product and replace it. I hope they do! I have similar musical books that after many years still work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: lukfam

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 2 year old for Christmas. She absolutely loves it and can't stop singing the songs. It entertained her for literally HOURS during a long Christmas road trip. There is no volume control but the sound can be turned off. Luckily, I don't find the (10) songs annoying, even after hours of listening to this device. I highly recommend this as a gift for a 2-4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: KRinLB

customer_reviews.title: Great as a gift... for someone else
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 2 year old daughter. Boy was that a mistake. I thought this was a story book where the sounds are part of a shark story. It is actually a whole bunch of class songs rewritten with sharks. After two weeks it had to go, far too annoying. However.... 5 stars as a gift for someone else's kid.
customer_reviews.author: Review dude

customer_reviews.title: Cute but pricey
customer_reviews.text: The music is really catchy for little ones but will drive parents nuts. It is great payback to your own children who now are parents LOL. On the not great side, it is pricey for what you get and there really should be more pages of pictures for the kiddos to look at. That being said our 22 month-old grandbaby loved dancing and clapping to the tunes.
customer_reviews.author: DCP

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The songs are full length and good quality audio. I just wish that the book part of it had actual stories instead of the words of the songs. The only thing my son cares about when he sees this book are the song buttons. It would been nice to have a story to read with him and the buttons and songs could tie into the story, maybe with a special time to push each button. I guess that's more of what I expected. All the book part is, are words to the songs and some of the pages don't even include the whole song.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley and Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Absolutely brilliant idea!
customer_reviews.text: If you are not annoyed by the Shark song being hit on repeat then this is your book!!! My daughter loves it! It has about 8 songs: Shark song, Wheel on the bus (the shark way..), twinkle twinkle little star, Christmas song among others! My 3 year old daughter loves it! We get very interactive with this book. My daughter is not one to sit and listen to a story but when it is sang to her. Boy! She laughs and enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Azteca

customer_reviews.title: Broke down extremely fast!
customer_reviews.text: This stopped working one month after the return window closed and I am not sure who to contact now. Complete junk, my kid is devastated now, he really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: The kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas Gift for my great neice and nephew...and they LOVED it...a whole room full of toys and this was the central item...I have no idea of the durability or volume control so that's why the ratings on those were neutral. These kids are not super "brand" oriented or character oriented but they know this and LOVED it!
customer_reviews.author: Ria Zmi

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Just received his book and I can say that I am super pleased with it. It is very colorful, the batteries are included, and the pages are kind of slick and soft yet durable perfect for my baby girl. There is also an on and off button which is a big plus. I bought this along with the plush baby shark and I can say that I like this way better as this is way louder and the included “shark” themed songs are pretty cute! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Luilitt

customer_reviews.title: Volume on the lower side, isn't always a bad thing............
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my 3 year old grandson. Volume control was on the quiet side making some of the song difficult to hear, but other than that, it was great. He loved it and that's what I was going for!
customer_reviews.author: Marie A. Carchidi

customer_reviews.title: Super catchy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter after I got tired of putting it on my phone. She is 14 mo so she would always end up taking the video off. When I saw this book though I thought it what a great idea! No date wasted and my baby can flip the pages while she sings her favorite songs. This would also make an awesome gift, I honestly may buy more for my other nieces who love the pinkfong songs!
customer_reviews.author: florg29

customer_reviews.title: My grandson LOVES this book
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is a baby shark fan, so he immediately fell in love with the book and wants us to read it to him all the time. He can entertain himself with it at 1 year old by pushing the buttons (and of course he dances!) I'm glad it has a variety of songs and not just the Baby Shark song!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn C.

customer_reviews.title: Very, very loud
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my one year old niece for Christmas, I didn't get one for my 9 month old son becuase that song is annoying and I didn't want to hear it on repeat. But my son loves the book, so now I had to order another for my niece. The volume is very loud, the on/off switch should've been a low/loud volume switch instead.
customer_reviews.author: TTShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We live in Korea so we only have the Korean version. My son likes the English version too so we bought this for him. We love that the cover is different so we don't mistake both, although the rest of the insides are the same design. Love that we can turn off the song if need be, to avoid any sound accidentally comes off when my son is sleeping. Great buy for any Baby Shark fan.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love baby shark? This is a must to add to your collection!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves baby shark! Since having this book, she’s learned to sing lots of songs. I like the fact that it has an on/off button on the back to turn off the music. Some just doesn’t and drives you insane. Well, my babygirl is 2 and after about 2 months now.m - surprising the book is still in one piece. I’d recommend to those that love baby shark!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is not obsessed with this book, she is POSSESSED! She absolutely loves playing the full length songs, and I prefer it to her watching a screen for it. It’s been several months since she got it, but it’s still her favorite book. I’ve been gifting this to my friends, as all of them are similarly obsessed w baby shark
customer_reviews.author: bk89

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: Really cute book! Would be a great gift for any kid. There is no volume control (low/med) like with some toys. Do like that the book comes with words for the song to help kids learn to read. Because of that, I feel it can be used from 6mo to where they’re just wanting to push the buttons to 3+ where they’re learning to read.
customer_reviews.author: Luvin_life

customer_reviews.title: Shark theme is adorable
customer_reviews.text: This book has a theme, since it is shark centered, I do want to give it 5 star, yet, no volume control and some songs are quite alike.
customer_reviews.author: linkivan

customer_reviews.title: Was my sons favorite for months
customer_reviews.text: Until he kinda got over his baby shark obsession recently. But he used to take it everywhere and he used to hate car rides and this was literally essential we couldn’t go anywhere without it in peace. If you have a baby shark fan this is literally a must have
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: It has baby shark plus
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my three-year-old granddaughter who loves baby shark. I liked it because it had other songs besides baby shark that she didn’t know but can learn and enjoy. Also it has an on and off button so you can turn the music off if you just want to read. She was thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Mosaic Melody

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old niece loved this book. She wouldn't put it down after I gave it to her. The buttons are easy for her to press, and the songs are a good variety. I also like that the volume isn't as loud. The price is a bit high, but it was a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Panda110

customer_reviews.title: Darling Book with Songs
customer_reviews.text: Although the book was smaller than I expected, (I just assumed it was going to be bigger), it was "just right" for our toddler's hands. He loves it and so does his three year old brother. The songs are familiar to both of the boys, and the voices in the songs are very clear and "on key"! I'm glad I bought this for them~ it was a real hit!
customer_reviews.author: Grammy N.

customer_reviews.title: Needs a volume control
customer_reviews.text: One thing I dont like about this is there isnt any volume control and its loud. I'm considering putting tape over the speaker like I had to do with toys in the past. With the technology they have these days idk "why" there isnt a volume control. Besides that my grandson loves this book.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Serich

customer_reviews.title: Presentation, música and illustration!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing book and quality ! I have bought at least 6 books from different sellers and this one so far is the BEST quality. The book comes in a sealed plastic which make it secure at moment of arrival. Easy to clean, great quality of paper and card board, good illustration and my baby boy just smile and laugh so much when he hear the different songs! 100% recommended it. I just bought another one ! 5 stars is not enough!
customer_reviews.author: Geo Lifestyle

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I looked at this for a long time before I finally made the purchase because it is a little pricey for a book. We finally just bought it as a Christmas gift and it had been a huge hit! Hours and hours have been spent listening and dancing to every song. It was a perfect gift for my 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie

customer_reviews.title: My twins loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect my twins love it when I got it because they are only 10 months now. I think the book is designed for order kids. I just bought it anyways because they can listen to the songs. I am surprise they both like it a lot!! They both want it while I play the songs every time! It became one of their favorite book/toy now!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Baby shark book
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my 2yr daughter. She loves baby shark and was singing alone to other songs it had.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality fun book of songs!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson gets the biggest smile on his face and jumps up and dances every time he hears the Baby Shark song, sooooo I bought this book. He LOVES this book. He enjoys pushing the buttons to hear all the songs. I highly recommend this excellent quality book!
customer_reviews.author: Pjaner

customer_reviews.title: Plays the whole song
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! I thought it was a little expensive but it's worth it! Each of the buttons plays the entire song not just like a 10 second clip. The sound quality is great for a book but it is kind of loud and no there isn't volume control its just on or off, but at least you can turn it off! Pages are are strong and thick great for 2 year old. Absolutely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Nurrml

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Don’t order this if you don’t want to be highly disappointed. Straight from the package, it doesn’t even work right. The batteries were corroded and the buttons do not function even after replacing the batteries. I would return it but I bought it for my granddaughter who lives several hundred miles away and it cost too much to ship it back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: rber386

customer_reviews.title: Good book, poor construction.
customer_reviews.text: We love this book! By “we” I mean my 2 year old is obsessed and my 3 year old is enchanted by it. My favorite part is the on/off switch. Cons: the spine was poorly put together, and after 4 days, it is peeling apart. I don’t see this book making it to Christmas, it is too fragile. My daughter will be devastated. 😢
customer_reviews.author: LaynaV.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Baby Shark fans
customer_reviews.text: This was part of an Easter gift to baby who loves the Baby Shark song. She is now 15 months and still loves playing with the book and having us sing a long with the songs. It is still in great shape and works like new.
customer_reviews.author: Grannyohio

customer_reviews.title: Not terribly annoying for parents
customer_reviews.text: Kids absolutely love this book. It plays several variations of baby shark and other nursery songs. As far as annoying noise-maling toys go, this is one of the better ones. Unfortunately you can't change the volume on the book so it's a little loud, but better than being too quiet.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought and not worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this book and it is pretty sturdy. That being said I was expecting something bigger, my fault. Also when it said baby shark plus other kids songs I was not thinking they just tossed baby shark name into other songs. I was pretty disappointed by it. I truly thought for $25 this book would have a lot more to it. I feel ripped off by this purchase and wouldn’t recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Maria

customer_reviews.title: Lots of cute songs and colorful images.
customer_reviews.text: If your toddler can’t get enough “baby shark” and will have a tantrum without it, this book is great! It has several ocean themed modifications to the songs we already know. For the adults it gets annoying quickly but I’d rather hear the songs over and over than listen to a temper tantrum while we’re driving down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia R.

customer_reviews.title: Full versions of all the songs in clear voices
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Full versions of all songs, clear voices, easy to push buttons, kids love this book, and there is an off switch Cons: Book is small, pricey, volume is loud, sign language in the book is tough to read Great book...Maybe get it.for that person who drives you a little nuts bc this book may drive you a little nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Calli W

customer_reviews.title: granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year-old granddaughter loves it, she is playing it all the time and singing with the songs on it. the songs are complete not just a little bit. The songs are clear so you can understand them. She is never bored with it. loves how the pages has a symbol at the top to show which song to push on the side.
customer_reviews.author: BECKY GORDON

product_meta.title: Pinkfong Baby Shark Sing-Alongs Sound Book
feature_bullets: BABY SHARK SONG BOOK - You've crooned it hundreds of times: "Baby Shark, doot-doo, doo, doo." But did you know there are actually nine other splash-tastic songs in the Baby Shark oeuvre?
READ & SING WITH YOUR CHILDREN - Hear all the songs and sing along with your favorite tiny tot with this colorfully charming, button-activated board book.
FUN FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY - For ages 3 and up, but fun for the whole family.
A GREAT GIFT - A wonderful baby shower gift or birthday present for any child.
DETAILS - Ages 3 & up, hardcover, 16 pages, 10 sounds, batteries included.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars6,045 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
